actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

official_title: To suspend until December 31, 2002, the duty on Benzenesulfonic acid, 4- [[3-[[2- hydroxy-3- [[4-methoxyphenyl) amino]carbonyl] -1- naphtha-lenyl]azo] -4- methylbenzoyl] amino]- calcium salt (2:1).

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 2002, the duty on benzenesulfonic acid, 4-((3-((2-hydroxy- 3-((4-methoxyphenyl) amino) carbonyl)-1-naphtha-lenyl)azo)-4-methylbenzoyl) amino)-, calcium salt (2:1).

titles.title: To suspend until December 31, 2002, the duty on Benzenesulfonic acid, 4- [[3-[[2- hydroxy-3- [[4-methoxyphenyl) amino]carbonyl] -1- naphtha-lenyl]azo] -4- methylbenzoyl] amino]- calcium salt (2:1).
